h2. Resources
* Read the [API Documentation|http://code.google.com/apis/opensocial/docs/0.8/reference/]
* Checkout [the Developer's guide|http://code.google.com/apis/opensocial/docs/0.8/devguide.html]
* Look at [the articles on opensocial|http://code.google.com/apis/opensocial/articles/]
* Watch the video explaining how to [deploy the gadgets|http://www.vimeo.com/2069512] and the [presentation in Bangkok|http://blog.exoplatform.org/2008/11/03/video-exo-introduces-exo-webos-15-beta-and-exo-social-preview-google-devfest-bangkok/]
* Look at a sample of [integration between eXo and appengine (Python backend)|http://blog.exoplatform.org/2008/11/13/writing-application-for-exo-social-with-appengine-so-not-in-java-but-in-python/]
* Checkout the existing [opensocial app developped for eXo|http://fisheye.exoplatform.org/browse/projects/social/trunk/web/opensocial/src/main/webapp/gadgets]
* Have a look at the project [opensocial-resources on google code|http://code.google.com/p/opensocial-resources/]
